mapper.select: SELECT M.MESSAGE_NUM, M.SENDER, M.RECEIVER, M.CONTENT, M.WRITE_DATE, M.STATUS, L.LECT_NAME, A.BEGINTIME, A.ENDTIME FROM MESSAGE M, ASSIGN_LECT A, LECTURE L WHERE M.ASSIGN_NUM = A.ASSIGN_NUM AND A.LECT_NUM = L.LECT_NUM AND MESSAGE_NUM = #{message_num}
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTALROWS FROM MESSAGE WHERE RECEIVER = #{receiver} AND RECEIVER_STATUS = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTALROWS FROM MESSAGE WHERE SENDER = #{sender} AND SENDER_STATUS = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) NUM FROM MESSAGE WHERE STATUS = 0 AND RECEIVER = #{receiver}

SELECT ROWNUM NUM, M.MESSAGE_NUM, M.SENDER, M.RECEIVER, M.CONTENT, M.WRITE_DATE, M.STATUS, L.LECT_NAME, A.BEGINTIME, A.ENDTIME FROM MESSAGE M, ASSIGN_LECT A, LECTURE L WHERE M.ASSIGN_NUM = A.ASSIGN_NUM AND A.LECT_NUM = L.LECT_NUM AND M.RECEIVER = #{receiver} AND M.RECEIVER_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY M.WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT ROWNUM NUM, M.MESSAGE_NUM, M.SENDER, M.RECEIVER, M.CONTENT, M.WRITE_DATE, M.STATUS, L.LECT_NAME, A.BEGINTIME, A.ENDTIME FROM MESSAGE M, ASSIGN_LECT A, LECTURE L WHERE M.ASSIGN_NUM = A.ASSIGN_NUM AND A.LECT_NUM = L.LECT_NUM AND M.SENDER = #{sender} AND M.SENDER_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY M.WRITE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE (MESSAGE_NUM, SENDER, RECEIVER, CONTENT, ASSIGN_NUM, WRITE_DATE) VALUES(MESSAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{content}, #{assign_num}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE MESSAGE SET STATUS = 1 WHERE MESSAGE_NUM = #{message_num}
UPDATE MESSAGE SET RECEIVER_STATUS = 0, STATUS = 1 WHERE MESSAGE_NUM = #{message_num}
UPDATE MESSAGE SET SENDER_STATUS = 0 WHERE MESSAGE_NUM = #{message_num}
